Board.name: draw
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: A simple vector-drawing tool
Board.description: A creative board where you can draw freely
Board.prerequisite: Needs to be capable of moving and clicking the mouse easily
Board.goal: In this game, children can draw freely. The goal is to discover how to create attractive drawings based on basic shapes: rectangles, ellipses and lines.
Board.manual: Select a drawing tool on the left, and a color down the bottom, then click and drag in the white area to create a new shape. To save time, you can click with the middle mouse button to delete an object.
